titleStmt.title: Proclamation crying down the English milned crowns and half-crowns ordaining the old-merk and half-merk-pieces to pass, and stopping the taking of bullion, at the mint-house.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the twenty one day of May, and of Our Reign the eight year, 1696.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
